application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3 (k & l) (submission of details (k) Notwithstanding the approved drawings, extent and form of alterations to the external front lightwell steps, including profiles of any new cladding; and (l) Notwithstanding the approved drawings, any new stone cladding to lightwell floors and external front basement steps including sample.) of listed building consent 22/02169 (Alterations to 30 Queen's Gate Terrace from the layout approved in 2017 under applications PP/17/04223 and LB/17/04224, and 2019 under applications LB/18/07633 and PP/18/07632, comprising internal alterations to the layout of the approved five residential units; minor external alterations to fenestration and railings and provision of a rooflight to the flat roof of the Mews building.)
